Claim: "A girl is in a tree and smiles."
Implication: "A smiling girl is sitting in a tree."
Referring expressions: Girl, tree, smile  A smiling girl, tree
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsInTree(b) and HasSmile(c))) & (forall e (forall f (  HasSmile(e) ->  IsSmiling(f)))) & (forall h (forall g ( IsSmiling(g) ->   HasSmile(h))))) -> (exists d (exists a (IsSmiling(d) and IsSittingInTree(a))))
